programme.title: The Interview
programme.sub-title: Celebrities: Anthony Hopkins - A Career in Character
programme.desc: In his own words, Sir Anthony Hopkins describes how a deeply troubled boy from Port Talbot, Wales, achieved two-time Oscar glory in Hollywood. Deemed a failure by his parents, peers and teachers, Sir Anthony Hopkins has triumphed in memorable roles like Hannibal Lecter, King Lear and the Pope. His extraordinary journey was paved with pain, rejection and addiction but was ultimately saved by love.

programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Nativity!
programme.desc: A primary school teacher, who was once a failed actor in a former career, is given the task of directing the schools Nativity play, which doesnt have a positive track record. Attitudes change however, when it transpires that a Hollywood producer is coming to film the play.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
programme.desc: Spider-Man teams up with Nick Fury and fellow superhero Mysterio to stop four massive elemental creatures -- each representing Earth, air, water and fire -- from wreaking havoc across Europe.

programme.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
programme.desc: Spider-Mans identity is revealed to everyone, and he can no longer separate his normal life from his superhero life. When he asks Doctor Strange for help, it forces him to discover what it means to be him.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.desc: Its Christmas in Finglas once again. Agnes has been recruited to the church choir, but shes under strict instructions from Father McBride that theres to be no singing and certainly no dancing. Thats not the only thing off-limits: a Christmas tree shortage means Buster has to get even more creative than usual to impress Agnes. Meanwhile, Dermot and Buster have organised this years festivities at Foleys and are holding a murder mystery night in aid of alcoholic greyhounds.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.desc: Its Christmas in Finglas again, and Agnes is failing to convince the gang shes not grumpy. Meanwhile, Cathy pulls the Finglas community together in support of a festive good cause, and Buster sources a sustainable tree.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Nessa and the Wests head east, with some help from Dave and his coach. Meanwhile in Essex, Dawn and Pete visit for drinks, Mick is preoccupied with his new love, and Smithy cannot wait to spend his first Christmas with Neil the Baby. Pam has prepared a lovely spread and Bryn has his mistletoe ready, but as the Christmas spirit gets a grip, Gavin and Stacey have a startling announcement to make.

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: Its been ten years since we last went to Billericay to spend Christmas with the Shipmans and the Wests.This year were off to Wales for the festivities, where Bryns cooking dinner for over thirteen people.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: With the Mitchells nursing their bitterness in all corners of the Square, Archie finally has the Vic to himself - but one by one his legion of enemies return with murder on their mind. Elsewhere, Bianca has a big question for Ricky and he has an even bigger answer, Stacey has an announcement that will rock Bradleys world, and just when Max thought things couldnt get any worse, they do.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Its Christmas day in Albert Square and things are set to explode in catastrophic style for Max. Meanwhile, Mick and Linda prepare for their vow renewals but Micks day is thrown into turmoil when Aidan plays a very dangerous game.

programme.title: EastEnders: Christmas 1986 - 2007
programme.desc: Ians surprise leaves Laura reeling, while Phil and Sonia try to cope with terrible news. Little Mo receives wedding gifts from the Slater girls. Pauline tries to put Martin in a better mood.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: Fastidious businessman Neal Page and slobbish shower-curtain salesman Del Griffith are the reluctant odd couple trying to get home from New York to Chicago to be with their families at Thanksgiving whose thwarted travel plans keep throwing them together in.

programme.title: Him and Her
programme.desc: Its Christmas Day in Steve and Beckys flat and Steves got a surprise visitor.

programme.title: EastEnders: Christmas 1986 - 2007
programme.desc: Ians surprise leaves Laura reeling, while Phil and Sonia try to cope with terrible news. Little Mo receives wedding gifts from the Slater girls. Pauline tries to put Martin in a better mood.

programme.title: A Mary Berry Christmas
programme.desc: Dame Mary Berry celebrates the magic of the seasons traditions. Along with her special guests - legendary actor Alison Steadman, Commonwealth sprinter and star of Gladiators Harry Aikines-Aryeetey and much-loved broadcaster and presenter Zoe Ball. And central to it all are Marys exceptional recipes, including pigs in blankets cassoulet, roast king mushrooms with chestnut stuffing, a magnificent cherry and lemon mille-feuille and a show-stopping grand finale of pear and ginger steamed pudding.

programme.title: Hidden Treasures of the National Trust
programme.sub-title: Christmas Treasures of the National Trust
programme.desc: The countdown to Christmas is on as the teams at three unique National Trust houses each race against the clock to deck their halls in time for their dazzling festive openings.

programme.title: Sir Chris Hoy: Cycle of Hope
programme.desc: Sir Chris Hoy opens up about his journey with terminal cancer and how the mental strength he honed as a six-time Olympic gold medallist is now helping him to inspire others. Filmed behind the scenes, the celebrated cyclist and his family share their experience of his cancer diagnosis in 2024. This emotive programme follows Hoy as he balances life as a husband, father and friend alongside treatment and the charity work hes so passionate about.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Mathew Baynton, Mel Giedroyc, Harriet Kemsley and Charles Venn test their general knowledge skills for a special festive show in Richard Osmans Festive House of Games.

programme.title: Celebrity Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Alistair Appleton faces his toughest assignment to date as he attempts to find broadcasting icon Janet Street-Porter a country retreat, away from prying neighbours.

programme.title: Gardeners World
programme.desc: Monty and the team celebrate the joy that the gardening year brings.

programme.title: Citizen Kane
programme.desc: Frequently voted one of the best films ever made, Orson Welless masterpiece tells the story of newspaper magnate Charles Foster Kane in a series of flashbacks. A reporter is intrigued by the dying Kanes last word - rosebud - and sets out to find a new angle on the life of one of the most powerful men in America. Nine Oscar nominations resulted in only one award for the outspoken Welles - Best Screenplay.

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martel is in Beeston, Nottinghamshire, to see a four-bed mid-terrace that the new owners have grand plans to turn into an HMO. Martin is in Welwyn Garden City, Hertfordshire, to see a three-bed end-terrace in need of a new lease of life. Jacqui is in Brighton visiting a rather grand Victorian terrace with five bedrooms over four floors.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Its the most wonderful time of the year... for bargain hunting! Eric Knowles and Father Christmas host an action-packed Christmas programme from Newark in Nottinghamshire. On the teams Christmas lists are profits aplenty, as they dash around stalls bursting with antiques and collectibles. Theyll be helped by two Christmas crackers, Raj Bisram and Izzie Balmer, as they gift their expert knowledge to the teams.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Nicki Chapman heads to the counties of Shropshire and Herefordshire to help a recently retired couple with a £550,000 budget find a dream country home thats full of traditional period charm. Away from the property search, Nicki meets enthusiasts who reach for the sky when she visits the Weston Park Model Air Show.

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
programme.desc: A young woman eagerly awaits the St Louis Exposition as much as love with the boy next door, only for her father to threaten to uproot them to New York, where promotion beckons.

programme.title: Doris Day: I Dont Even Like Apple Pie
programme.desc: In a rare television interview, Doris Day looks back over her successful acting and singing career, and recalls happy memories of working with Rock Hudson, James Cagney, Clark Gable and James Garner.

programme.title: Calamity Jane
programme.desc: Indian scout Calamity Jane is as handy with a gun as any man in Deadwood, Dakota Territory. When sent to Chicago to recruit an actress for the Golden Garter stage, the woman proves to be a more feminine rival for the attentions of Janes male friends, including Wild Bill Hickok.

programme.title: Carols from Kings
programme.desc: A celebration of Christmas from the stunning, candlelit Kings College Chapel, Cambridge, beginning in the time-honoured way as a solo chorister sings the first verse of Once in Royal Davids City.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: Mathew Baynton, Mel Giedroyc, Harriet Kemsley and Charles Venn test their general knowledge skills for a special festive show in Richard Osmans Festive House of Games.

programme.title: Celebrity Mastermind
programme.desc: Clive Myrie asks the questions as Gareth Malone, Gamba Cole, Yewande Biala and Lucy Beaumont go under the spotlight in the celebrity version of the classic quiz.

programme.title: Only Connect
programme.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz where knowledge only gets you so far. Its Christmas, and two families from series gone by have come together to play an exasperating game.

programme.title: University Challenge
programme.desc: Keble College, Oxford play Hull in another Christmas match. Anne-Marie Imafidon and Joanna Nadin lead the teams, and Amol Rajan asks the questions.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Bob, Paul and Ted head to Devon and Cornwall for the festivities this year. They meet local legend Dawn French, have a bankside consultation with Dr Anand Patel and cook a meal with Paul Ainsworth.

programme.title: The Room in the Tower: A Ghost Story for Christmas
programme.desc: Roger has been haunted by a recurring dream, a mysterious house and an unseen terror. He becomes disturbed as they become reality. What is lurking in the room in the tower?

programme.title: Indecent Proposal
programme.desc: Happily married couple Diana and David Murphy find themselves at risk of financial destitution when the recession hits them. Deciding to take a big risk, they head for Las Vegas hoping to win big on the tables. The gamble, however, proves disastrous, but enigmatic millionaire John Gage offers the couple $1 million for a night with Diana.

programme.title: The Duchess
programme.desc: Following the tumultuous life of the 18th-century Duchess of Devonshire, a bright, popular aristocrat who is trapped in a failed marriage and has to face personal conflicts - including living with her husbands mistress and falling passionately in love with a young politician. Based on Amanda Foremans bestselling novel `Georgiana, Duchess of Devonshire.

programme.title: Beyond Paradise
programme.desc: With unexpected visitors, festive cases to solve and a heartwarming reunion on the line, can the team juggle it all and still be ready in time for Marthas Christmas surprise?

programme.title: Amanda and Alans Spanish Job
programme.desc: Amanda and Alan return to Spain in this one-off Christmas special. Reuniting with old friends, they celebrate an Anglo-Spanish Christmas, hosting a feast at their Moclin home.

programme.title: Celebrity MasterChef
programme.desc: GK Barry, Kola Bokinni, Nikki Fox and Iain Stirling compete in the 2025 Celebrity MasterChef Christmas Cook-Off.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: My Life at Christmas with Anita Rani
programme.desc: Anita Rani pays a Christmas visit to Baroness Floella Benjamin to reflect on a remarkable life shaped by family, faith and the festive season.

programme.title: Royal Institution Christmas Lectures
programme.sub-title: Chris van Tulleken: The Truth About Food - From Tastebuds to Toilet
programme.desc: Dr Chris van Tulleken is joined by leading experts, including his twin brother Xand, to explore the journey food takes through the bodies. Prue Leith drops by with some confusing Christmas foods to help Chris crack the mysterious science of taste.

programme.title: A Christmas Choir with Michelle McManus
programme.desc: Michelle McManus is joined by two wonderful choirs to celebrate the season with a sackful of Christmas songs.

programme.title: Carols from Kings
programme.desc: A celebration of Christmas from the stunning, candlelit Kings College Chapel, Cambridge, beginning in the time-honoured way as a solo chorister sings the first verse of Once in Royal Davids City.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit: A Matter of Loaf and Death
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromit have opened a new bakery and business is booming, not least because a deadly Cereal Killer has murdered all the other bakers in town. Gromit is worried that they may be next but Wallace does not care as he has fallen in love.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit: A Grand Day Out
programme.desc: Wallace and Gromit have run out of cheese and this provides an excellent excuse for the animated duo to take their holiday on the moon, where, as everyone knows, there is ample cheese.

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: As Kenneth Branagh prepares to unveil the latest version of Death on the Nile, Celia Imrie looks at how the classic murder mysteries of the great Agatha Christie have been treated by film-makers over the years.

programme.title: The Nutcracker from the Royal Ballet
programme.desc: Christmas comes to life in this magical production from ballet legend Sir Peter Wright, delighting a packed audience at Covent Gardens Royal Opera House.

programme.title: White Christmas
programme.desc: Two army buddies who have become entertainers travel to a Vermont ski resort for a well-earned rest. However, on arrival they find the resort - run by their old army commander - in need of a helping hand. Theres only one answer - put on a show.

programme.title: The King
programme.desc: HM King Charles III delivers his annual Christmas message to the nation and the Commonwealth.

programme.title: Evil Under the Sun
programme.desc: Hercule Poirot sets out to uncover the truth behind the death of an unpopular stage star at a resort hotel on an Adriatic island.

programme.title: Dads Army at the BBC
programme.desc: Toby Jones presents a set of must-see Dads Army moments from the BBCs archives, including Mainwaring dancing and sparring with Morecambe and Wise and a special tribute to Noel Coward.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: Capt Mainwaring has an unexpected and most unwelcome guest, much to the delight of Frazer - his twin brother.

programme.title: Keeping Up Appearances
programme.desc: In this Christmas special Hyacinth is plagued by problems. While busy planning a new kitchen she is told that there is someone in fathers bed who is most certainly not father himself. She then learns that Richard has gone down with a fungus infection, and is horrified to find that he has such a vulgar ailment.

programme.title: The Morecambe and Wise Show
programme.desc: Sketches and stand-up comedy from Eric Morecambe and Ernie Wise from 1968, remarkably restored after being feared lost for decades.

programme.title: The Morecambe and Wise Show
programme.desc: A star-studded holiday special starring Eric Morecambe and Ernie Wise, first broadcast in 1975. With special guests Diana Rigg, Des OConnor, Gordon Jackson, Diane Solomon, Robin Day, Brenda Arnau and Pans People.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: Jaws @ 50: The Definitive Inside Story
programme.desc: Interviews, outtakes and never-before-seen footage provide insight into the chaos and creativity behind the making of Steven Spielbergs legendary blockbuster "Jaws."

programme.title: And Now for Something Completely Different
programme.desc: Silly walks and dead parrots are among the items in this compilation of skits from `Monty Pythons Flying Circus. Watch the team unleash the funniest moments from their early days.

programme.title: Call the Midwife
programme.desc: Senior members of Nonnatus House travel to Hong Kong to tackle a crisis at the orders branch house, and Dr Turner and Shelagh search for Mays birth mother.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Jurassic Bear; Extreme Fitness; Domestic Robots; Mass Control; Bear Under Control; Popcorn Party; Dancing with the Bears; Role Change; Lemming Tonic
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky Lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: The Snake Dance; Grasshopper Chep; The Adventurers; Getting Truffy With It; Good Vibrations
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Work Like a Charm; The Breathtaking Bolly Show; Whos Eating Mushton; Mush-Mush The Predictor
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his best friends Chep and Lilit have all kinds of adventures in the forest. They are the protectors of the forest and they all have a unique power.

programme.title: Moley
programme.sub-title: Wormalicious; Keeper for a Day; For All Molekind; Some Like it Cool
programme.desc: Revolving around an adventurous moles quest with friends to broker peace between humans and moles. Following the underground adventures of the charmingly optimistic young mole, Moley.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.sub-title: Back To School; Lord Bean; Car Wars; Wedding Day
programme.desc: Following the animated adventures of the clueless yet brilliant Mr Bean and his faithful sidekick Teddy.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Santas Little Helpers
programme.desc: Jerry lives the good life at Santas workshop until the Claus family rescues a cat, but the pair must work together to save Christmas.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.sub-title: Christmas in Oz: Part 1; Christmas in Oz: Part 2
programme.desc: What? No Christmas in Oz? Dorothy introduces Oz to Christmas and of course Oz adds a few traditions of its own. / The Wicked Witch has kidnapped Santa in an attempt to steal his magic. Can Dorothy and her friends save Santa in time for him to save Christmas in Oz?

programme.sub-title: Fitness Instructor; Trampoline Trouble; Sheepish Bean; Page Turner
programme.desc: Mr Bean embarks on plenty of adventures, along with his sidekick, Teddy. They try to stay out of the way of Mrs Wicket and her cat Scrapper, but often end up in trouble.

programme.title: Bluey

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey gets a new teddy for Christmas and introduces him to the whole family, but the family plays too rough with him and now he wants to go home.

Determined to have his Christmas Day, he sets about trying to spread his own festive cheer by covering the island in snow.

programme.desc: A honey badger claims a watering hole, so Kwazii challenges her to a digging contest.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When the Heeler home goes up for sale, Bluey is not at all happy about the news.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve and Santas sleigh has vanished. The Go Jetters must try save Christmas.

programme.desc: Its Christmastime, and Dodge is asked by Miss Collie to direct the school Christmas show.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve and the Tumble Family are desperately trying to get everything ready for Christmas Day. In true Tumble fashion, chaos ensues.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Po eats Tubby Custard and gets a messy bib. Po washes the bib clean and hangs it out to dry before eating more Tubby Custard with Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa.

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome babies Connor, Bonnie, Ian, Dhilan, Addi, Gracie and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Inside everyones bags are wooden spoons which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding baby appropriate wooden spoons inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby! The popular nursery rhyme `Little Miss Muffet features, as does a story involving Baby Bear.

programme.title: Maddie and Triggs
programme.desc: Maddie and Triggs are baking a cake for Granny, but when the recipe goes missing they are forced to mix it up and add some surprising new ingredients that are quite simply bonkers.

programme.title: Dylans Playtime Adventures
programme.desc: Dylan the deep-sea diver wants to take a picture of the deepest darkest bottom of the sea, but when he discovers its too dark for his camera, he turns to a new friend.

programme.title: Kiri and Lou
programme.desc: Sorry takes her friends on a journey into colour and sound.

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Ginger the Tricarrotops explores the world of the crunchiest era, going on adventures throughout the colourful Vegesaur Valley.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey pretends to run a taxi service, where her first passenger is Businessman Dad, who urgently needs to get to the airport.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing outside in the snow and decide to build a jolly-looking snowman. But when the punky penguins turn up and poke fun at it, the competition REALLY hots up. The Squirrels make a snow slug, then the penguins make a snow bird. In the end, the very best thing they make is something they have all made together... an ENORMOUS snow slide!

programme.title: The Game Catchers
programme.desc: The Catchmen land on the planet Bounce, where they befriend some alien children and bounce together on every surface.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Kid has the hiccups so he and Timmy try everything to get rid of them, to no avail.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.desc: When Henry and his family go on a trip to a nearby pond, its fishing nets at the ready as they try their hand at a spot of shrimping. Its not easy as the tiny shrimp are good at hiding. Luckily, Henry comes up with a plan.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Brunsli Biscuits are a traditional Swiss recipe that taste and smell very Christmassy. Tilly adds spices such as ground nutmeg to her chocolate biscuit dough, before cutting it into snowflake shapes. With the help of her sister, Tilly decorates her biscuits with a beautiful white icing. Tillys table has lots of Christmas decorations on it as well as the traditional flower of Switzerland, edelweiss. Lets hope Tillys friends enjoy the taste of the biscuits!

programme.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Ishi wants to find out all about barnacles, so Chantelle meets some new friends at the beach and they head off to look for barnacles, whilst Rory meets a marine expert and they get their feet wet.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Its a new day, and Mrs Farrell is checking in with all the children to see how they are. Lucas tells her he is looking for more friends to play with, and there are lots of volunteers! Isla, Otto and Jud bake some delicious tiger ginger biscuits, using coloured icing for roar-some decorations. At playtime, Jud asks if she can play with Lucas, and they have a fun-filled game of chase. The day ends with carpet-time, and Lucas is happy with his new-found friends.

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: Jocelyn MacNab, Joshua Lester, Anna Acton, Chris Hannon, Suzy Aitchison, Abigail OBrien. Live-action childrens show. Its the night before Christmas, and Topsy and Tim finish decorating the tree. The twins enjoy wrapping gifts for Mummy and Dad, dancing around the living room and hanging up their stockings. Before going to sleep, Topsy and Tim sneak a look out of the bedroom window for Father Christmas and enjoy a magical surprise.

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say ear, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different ears - listening, chilly and even alien ones!

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: Stan Elf is on a mission to deliver all the letters to Santa. Can the Alphablocks help him and save Christmas? This episode has fun with letter teams and clusters and the magic words: bells, elf, feast, gifts, jolly, hat and holly.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Again comes to Toads aid when it seems he is going to be late meeting some friends.

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Its time to colour Christmas. In this special song episode, Red and Green colour in all things related to Christmas with the help of the other Colourblocks. From a snowman to a Christmas tree and the mighty brussels sprouts, the Colourblocks eventually create a very colourful Christmas for all to enjoy.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing outside in the snow and decide to build a jolly-looking snowman. But when the punky penguins turn up and poke fun at it, the competition REALLY hots up. The Squirrels make a snow slug, then the penguins make a snow bird. In the end, the very best thing they make is something they have all made together... an ENORMOUS snow slide!

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: When Yukees precious clockwork music box breaks, her garden friends cheer her up with a life-size clockwork performance of their own.

programme.title: Small Potatoes
programme.sub-title: I Love to Dance the Flamenco
programme.desc: Dance along with the gang as they visit Spain for a flamenco dancing fiesta.

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Maddie meets two friends to play games at the park and Mr Tumble dances with the toys.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-­-Laa and Po watch bunny rabbits. Bunny ears and tails appear on the Teletubbies. They do the bunny hop hop before saying eh oh to the Tiddlytubbies.

programme.title: CBeebies Presents: The Night Before Christmas
programme.desc: A host of CBeebies stars return to the stage with a unique adaptation of the classic poem. Sing, dance, boo and cheer as Holly endeavours to stop The Wish Taker ruining Christmas.

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: The adventures of ten friends in Numberland who can always count on each other. Each friend has a different ability that helps them on their adventures.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: When Kwaziis Gup-B breaks down in a storm, not even brave Captain Barnacles can save him alone. Fortunately, a chain of reef lobsters lends a hand and some claws.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Hungry Thieves
programme.desc: When Sammy Whiskers dupes three innocent mice into stealing the rabbits plum pie, Peter must rescue both pie and mice from the clutches of Mr Tod.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Who brings a team of cheerleaders to a chess match? Duggee does!

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: When her patients fall on slippery ice, Vida fixes their booboos and their icy issues.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Its Merry Sprouty Day, and everyone is waiting for Sprouty Claus, who is bringing presents to all the good fruit and veggies. However, Evil Pea has an evil plan to steal the presents for herself.

programme.title: The Weasy Family
programme.desc: The ducklings want to have a beautiful family portrait with their pop, but Weasy makes faces and monkeys around. The ducklings decide to take a surprise photo of him so that he will look natural.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops
programme.desc: Preston left an egg sandwich out for too long, and now its explosive smell is stinking up the whole town. Mojo and Bo need to evacuate everyone in Swoppiton before the eggy stinkplosion!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bluey plays mum to a brood of bouncy balloons, including an irrepressible floater named Greeny. Mum and Bluey play `Mum School, in which Mum agrees to teach Bluey how to control her rowdy kids and be a better mum.

programme.title: Piripenguins
programme.desc: Brinicle tries to write a hit fundraising single, but but is stumped for ideas.

programme.title: Mr Bears Christmas
programme.desc: Set in the corner of the forest, Mr Bear and his best friend Mouse share their joy of Christmas as they plan a party for all their friends with plenty of festive treats. While getting ready for the party, Mouse ventures out into the forest to find some berries, only to get caught in a snow storm. Despite his best efforts, Mr Bear cant find Mouse and becomes increasingly worried for her as time passes by.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola
programme.sub-title: How Many More Minutes to Christmas?
programme.desc: Lola is extremely excited because Christmas is coming, and they are taking it in turns to open the advent calendar. Everything looks set for the perfect Christmas, until Lola discovers that there is no door for Christmas Day. Desperate to find out what is going on Charlie and Lola scramble inside the advent calendar and confirm their worst fears.

programme.title: JoJo and Gran Gran
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran head to the library in search of the new Captain Chloe book, but they discover the childrens section is closed for redecoration. JoJo, Gran Gran and their friends all help to paint a pirate picture on the library wall.

programme.title: Moon and Me
programme.desc: Moon Baby, Pepi Nana and their friends discover a toy roundabout left in the Toy House. Moon Baby uses his story magic, and the roundabout transports everybody to an adventure in Storyland, where Mr Onion rescues Dibillos balloon from a tree.

programme.title: Clangers
programme.desc: Small is out fishing and Baby Soup Dragon is helping his Mum, so Tiny has no one to play with. He plays catch by himself but its not much fun. Major Clanger notices that Tiny looks bored and makes him a special cone-shaped gadget which launches a cotton ball up into the air for the user to catch in the cone. Mother calls Tiny to ask for some help in the garden and Tiny leaves the gadget on the floor while she goes off to help her Mum. But when she gets back, the gadget has disappeared.

programme.desc: Some extra brunch as Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer host the food and chat show.

programme.desc: Woodgreen Pets Charity try to find homes for their abandoned dogs in time for Christmas. Ziggy, a fox terrier, hopes she can steal the hearts of the Thompson family. And Emori the three-legged German Shepherd is introduced to retiree Pauline.

programme.title: Terry Pratchetts The Abominable Snow Baby
programme.desc: A small town is thrown into disarray by the unexpected appearance of a 14-foot snow monster. The creature is rescued by the indomitable Granny and her grandson Albert, but not everyone is happy with the new arrangement.

programme.title: The Snowman
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve and a little boy decides to make a snowman. During the night, the snowman comes to life and whisks the boy off to the North Pole for a meeting with a very important person.

programme.title: Father Christmas
programme.desc: Father Christmas decides its time for a well-earned holiday. Transforming his sleigh into a caravan, Santa sets off on a world trip, but he might have left it too late to prepare for next years Christmas.

programme.title: The Snowman and the Snowdog
programme.desc: The sequel to Raymond Briggss classic `The Snowman. When a young boy, Billy, and his mother move house, he discovers a box hidden under the floorboards of his bedroom.

programme.title: Were Going on a Bear Hunt
programme.desc: Following the Intrepid adventures of siblings Stan, Katie, Rosie, Max, the baby and Rufus the dog, who decide one day to `catch a big one and set off on an expedition in search of bears.

programme.title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
programme.desc: A young girl named Sophie invites an anthropomorphised tiger over for an intimate tea party. He proceeds to drink all the tea and eat all the food.

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Engaging family tale based on Dick King-Smiths classic story about an orphaned piglet which is adopted by a sheepdog and learns how to herd sheep. Babe at first seems destined to end up on the dining table at Christmas, but the farmer realises that the animals unusual talent may bring him glory in the sheepdog trials.

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary.

programme.title: Hamleys: Top 100 Toys of All Time
programme.desc: Hamleys opens its doors for a celeb-packed celebration of the toys that defined generations: from timeless classics to modern icons, we explore the biggest toy crazes of the last 200 years.

programme.title: Sister Act
programme.desc: A cabaret singer witnesses a murder and goes undercover as a nun. In the convent, she is put in charge of coaching the choir, which she transforms into a toe-tapping rhythm group. As a result, the churchs congregation swells until even the Pope comes to witness pop classics such as `My Guy performed to glorify the Lord, but of course, her fame gives away her hiding place to the killer.

programme.title: The Snowman

programme.desc: A 16-year-old boy embarks on a quest to prove to his dad wrong - that actually Father Christmas is real. A star-studded, heart-warming festive drama featuring Greg Davies and Stephen Fry.

programme.desc: The Walsh boys head to Iceland for an epic Christmas adventure. programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: An old high-school friend of Monicas is invited to the Thanksgiving dinner with the gang, but Monica is unaware that he isnt exactly fond of Rachel. Meanwhile, Chandler and Phoebe pretend to be mesmerised by American football in order to avoid helping Monica in the kitchen, and Joey vows to devour the entire turkey single-handedly.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler is aghast when Monica buys painfully expensive boots, and Phoebe tries to capitalise on her discovery that Ross son attends school with the son of rock star Sting.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean rushes to the dentists office after oversleeping, then helps a boy fix his remote-controlled toy boat, and later is menaced by a wasp while having a picnic.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes Christmas shopping, conducts a Salvation Army band, and has Christmas dinner with his long-suffering girlfriend.

programme.title: Michael McIntyres Big Show
programme.desc: With performances from soul sensation Seal and comedy virtuoso Bill Bailey, as well as new stand-up material from Michael himself. Plus Alesha Dixon will be handing over her phone in Celebrity Send To All and Father Christmas gets the surprise of his life before delivering a spine-tingling finale as the Unexpected Star.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandlers Work Laugh
programme.desc: Monica is annoyed when she discovers Chandler is ingratiating himself with his new boss Doug. He even has a fake laugh which he uses whenever Doug cracks a joke. Meanwhile, Rachel is obsessed with finding out the gossip between Monica and Chandler after overhearing a sexy conversation between them, and Ross astounds everyone with his new girlfriend, a blast from the past.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine, while Ross and Monica resurrect their silly high school dance routine for a television special.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One That Could Have Been
programme.desc: In the second episode showing what could have happened to the friends had their lives taken different paths, Carol and Ross decide to have a threesome to spice up their marriage, while Rachel goes to Joeys and kisses him and then catches Barry cheating.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Dates a Student
programme.desc: When a fire damages their apartment, Rachel and Phoebe must choose between living temporarily with Joey or Monica. Meanwhile, Ross gets into trouble at work, and Chandler tries to help Joeys career.

programme.title: Batteries not Included
programme.desc: A group of New York tenement dwellers face eviction and receive help from an unlikely source. Just when it seems that nothing short of a miracle will save their homes, a miracle is just what they get in the shape of tiny visitors from outer space whose magical powers have the bad guys on the run.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Thanksgivings
programme.desc: As the gang digests Monicas huge Thanksgiving meal, everyone reminisces about their worst Thanksgiving ever.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Inappropriate Sister
programme.desc: After returning from another disappointing audition, Joey tries to write a play in which he can star. Meanwhile, Rachel gets a date with her neighbour Danny, but is perturbed to discover his extremely intimate relationship with his sexy sister.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine, while Ross and Monica resurrect their silly high school dance routine for a television special.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Holiday Armadillo
programme.desc: Ross unexpectedly finds himself looking after Ben and decides to do something special for Christmas. Since all the Santa costumes have been rented out, Ross dons the best outfit left and entertains Ben as the holiday armadillo.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Ross Step Forward
programme.desc: Ross new girlfriend wants to put their photograph on Christmas cards, Rachel eyes Joey as a possible romantic partner, and the newlyweds cope with Chandlers boss as he goes through a divorce.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Christmas in Tulsa
programme.desc: Chandler is forced to remain in Tulsa over the Christmas period due to a major deadline at work, and Monica fears the worst when she finds out that he will be joined in Tulsa by a beautiful colleague Wendy. While he works, Chandler recalls some of the more embarrassing moments from previous holidays shared with his friends.

programme.desc: A miserable con man and his pint-sized partner pose as Santa and his Little Helper, with a wicked plan to rob department stores on Christmas Eve. However, they run into problems when the con man befriends a troubled kid who teaches them the true meaning of Christmas.

He is hurriedly sent off to the St Clabberts Old Priests Home for immediate treatment. However, Jacks replacement seems to be even more trouble that the great man himself, so Ted and Dougal decide to mount a `Guns of Navarone-style rescue operation to get him back.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA

The situation has become desperate and dad Tony is now in danger of losing his life savings.

programme.title: First Dates

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Amys apartment is flooded, she has to vacate it for five weeks while repairs are carried out and proposes a `cohabitation experiment with Sheldon. Howard and Bernadette have decided they dont want to know the gender of their unborn child.

programme.title: James Martins British Adventure
programme.desc: James culinary tour of Britain continues in Scotland with a trip to Blair Castle in the Highlands. He is joined by top Scottish Michelin starred chef Tom Kitchin. Their journey begins with an incredible tour of the castle grounds complete with awe inspiring views. James kicks off the cooking with his venison with beetroot and blackberries in the castles walled garden. Next Tom Kitchin dusts of his wellies and heads in to the woods for a bit of wild mushroom foraging.

programme.title: James Martins British Adventure
programme.desc: James and Tom are making their way to Edinburgh but before they can do that, James makes a detour to Edradour whisky distillery in Pitlochry where he makes a delicious whisky chicken with wild mushroom and mustard sauce. Once theyve reached Edinburgh, Tom shares his local knowledge by visiting one of his favourite suppliers, Welch Fishmongers. He learns the secret to their amazing smoked salmon which James uses for a salmon mousse with cucumber and dill pickle and melba toast.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: The time has come to cross the border from Scotland to England and where better to begin this leg of the journey than James home country of Yorkshire. Here hes joined by Michelin starred chef Lisa Allen. His first stop is Whitby where hes popping into his favourite fish and chip shop before cooking tikka mackerel buns with fennel and apple salad for the crowds at Whitby bandstand. Lisa is paying a visit to The Black Swan.

programme.title: The Art of Architecture

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on the botched mission during Americas military involvement in Somalia in the early 1990s. An attempt by US Army Rangers parachuted into Mogadishu to capture a warlords two top lieutenants goes disastrously wrong when two helicopters are shot down.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save his captive wife from King Leopolds devious envoy.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Loose-cannon cops Lowrey and Burnett reduce Miami to rubble as they try to stop Cuban and Russian drug smugglers from flooding Florida with ecstasy.

programme.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
programme.desc: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises to combat massive, malevolent foes that have been feeding on a nuclear plants reactors and now threaten mankind with total annihilation.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Adaptation of the adventures of the swinging comic-strip hero. A shy student becomes a crime fighter after a bite from a mutant spider, during a school outing, gives him extraordinary powers. As he comes to terms with his new-found abilities, he is also forced to contend with a maniac villain known as the Green Goblin.

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The comic book web-slinger returns for a blockbusting sequel. Crime-fighting has cost Peter Parker his best friend and his true love Mary Jane. However, just as he quits as Spider-Man, New York comes under threat from Dr Octopus, a metal-tentacled madman. Peter has no choice but to swing back into action.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: Life is sweet for Peter Parker, MJ loves him, her career is taking off and Spidey-mania is sweeping New York. However, when an alien parasite bonds to his suit, its not long before the good times and Spidey turn bad. While his ugly ego is taking centre stage, MJ is dumped from her Broadway show, Harry remembers Spider-Mans role in his fathers death, and Peter is consumed by revenge.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The eponymous commando is coaxed out of retirement to act as a guide to a group of aid workers on a humanitarian mission in Burma. However, when the Burmese army captures the group, he mounts a violent one-man rescue mission to try to save the missionaries.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: A spoiled rat gets flushed down the toilet and finds himself stranded in Londons sewer underworld. A savvy scavenger helps him evade frog assassins and make his way back to his plush home.

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: One day, Fox and Hare discover that Owl has disappeared. They go looking for him in the forest with all their friends and discover a big lake that wasnt there before. It is the beginning of an exciting and funny adventure.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a greedy villain. The rivals team up to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
programme.desc: Inventor Flint Lockwood dreams of discovering an idea that will change peoples lives forever, and after several misguided attempts he may just have done it. Flint has invented a machine that can turn water into delicious food, and, when his first demonstration accidentally sends the machine shooting into the clouds, cheeseburgers begin raining down from the sky.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Discovering that his most-famous machine is now creating animal/vegetable hybrids, inventor Flint Lockwood and his friends venture forth to save the world from tacodiles, shrimpanzees and other creatures.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas in Wonderland
programme.desc: The Queen of Hearts has outlawed Christmas! Can St Nick, Alice, the Mad Hatter and March Hare save the day? Animation with Emilia Clarke, Gerard Butler and Simone Ashley. (2024, 90 mins)

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Trolls
programme.desc: Poppy, the optimistic leader of the trolls, and Branch, her polar opposite, embark on an adventure that takes them far beyond the only world theyve ever known.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A wildly imaginative seven-year-old boy discovers that his new brother, Boss Baby, is actually a spy on a secret mission, and only he can help thwart a dastardly plot that involves an epic battle between puppies and babies.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Shipwrecked on a deserted island, a robot named Roz must learn to adapt to its new surroundings. Building relationships with the native animals, Roz soon develops a parental bond with an orphaned gosling.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A champion NASCAR drivers cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Electronics store stock boy Andy Stitzer is horrified when he is found out as a virgin by his workmates - just when he thought he was becoming one of the gang. David, Jay and Cal surprise him by making it their mission to get him a girl and help him lose his virginity.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel in which Wayne and Garth decide to stage a rock festival. After losing his late-night cable show, Wayne has a dream in which Jim Morrison tells him to put on a massive music festival - Waynestock. Before this can be achieved, the budding promoters must overcome several hurdles and sort out their turbulent love lives.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: A champion NASCAR drivers cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: The 40-Year-Old Virgin
programme.desc: Electronics store stock boy Andy Stitzer is horrified when he is found out as a virgin by his workmates - just when he thought he was becoming one of the gang. David, Jay and Cal surprise him by making it their mission to get him a girl and help him lose his virginity.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: Jackass Number Two
programme.desc: Daredevils go for the gross-out when they subject an unsuspecting public to more outrageous stunts and practical jokes.

programme.title: Pawn Sacrifice
programme.desc: American chess legend Bobby Fischer and Soviet Grandmaster Boris Spassky enthral the world with their intense battle of wills and strategy during the 1972 World Chess Championship.

programme.title: It Ends With Us
programme.desc: Lily Bloom falls for a charming neurosurgeon after she moves to Boston to chase her dream of opening her own business. However, when her first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship gets upended, leaving her with an impossible choice.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: The days leading up to the tragedy of President John F. Kennedys assassination and its immediate aftermath are chronicled as they were experienced by the First Lady, wife of the charismatic president and mother of two small children.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: The story of photographer Elizabeth `Lee Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: The story of photographer Elizabeth `Lee Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

programme.title: Lee
programme.desc: The story of photographer Elizabeth `Lee Miller, a fashion model who became an acclaimed war correspondent for Vogue magazine during World War II.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Barts successful stage musical based on Dickenss tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Perennial family favourite about Dorothy, a young girl from the American Midwest, who is swept by a cyclone to a magical kingdom over the rainbow. There she meets a scarecrow, a tin man and a cowardly lion, who join her on a quest to find the all-powerful Wizard of Oz, the only man who can help her get back to to Kansas. However, the Wicked Witch of the West has other plans for Dorothy and her new friends.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Barts successful stage musical based on Dickenss tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Alan Parrish disappeared as a young boy. Nobody believes his friends story that he was sucked into the game they were playing. Twenty-six years later, two children find the game in their attic, and when they start to play, Alan is released, but the game isnt over yet, and Alan must finish before he is really free.

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: The story of a reclusive green ogre called Shrek whose life of solitude is disrupted by a horde of refugees who have been banished by the evil Lord Farquaad. Determined to save his home, Shrek cuts a deal with the tyrant, who sets him a daunting task - if Shrek is ever to enjoy peace and quiet again, he must rescue Farquaads bride-to-be from a dangerous castle.

programme.title: Shrek 2
programme.desc: Ogre Shrek and his new wife Fiona are surprised to discover a letter from her parents, inviting them over for dinner. Fiona is eager to show off her new husband, but her parents dont yet know shes an ogre. Taking Donkey along, they set off for Far Far Away to visit them, but the trip is hampered by the jealousy of a wicked fairy godmother and her hired assassin, Puss in Boots.

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: Shrek is just starting to settle down in his beloved swamp with his wife Fiona, but their mucky bliss doesnt last for long as word arrives that the ogres froggy father-in-law is about to croak. The very last thing Shrek wants is to become King, but with no other heir in sight, it looks like the grumpy green one is destined never to live quietly in the swamp again. A glimmer of hope appears in the form of heir Artie.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Sweethearts
programme.desc: Two college freshmen make a pact to break up with their high school sweethearts over Thanksgiving break, leading them on a chaotic night out in their hometown that puts their codependent friendship to the test.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: When Mary Lennoxs parents suddenly die, she is sent to live with her uncle, Archibald Craven, on his remote country estate deep in the Yorkshire moors. While exploring, she discovers a hidden magical garden.

programme.title: Sweethearts
programme.desc: Two college freshmen make a pact to break up with their high school sweethearts over Thanksgiving break, leading them on a chaotic night out in their hometown that puts their codependent friendship to the test.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually cant afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonkas chocolate factory.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: Wicked
programme.desc: An unlikely friendship emerges between Elphaba and Glinda, two clashing witches in the magical land of Oz. Elphaba is wrongfully cast as a wicked witch as she seeks to expose the fraudulent, corrupt Wizard who rules the land.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4

programme.title: The Wedding Banquet
programme.desc: Hoping to stay in the country, a gay man proposes a green card marriage to a female friend in exchange for paying for her IVF treatment. However, things get complicated when his grandmother surprises them with an extravagant Korean wedding banquet.

programme.title: Hallow Road
